name: Cavatini
author: Brian Hulshof

ingredients.name: oz. pkg. mixed pasta shapes, cooked and drained

instructions: Brown ground beef and drain. Combine ground beef, spaghetti sauce, green pepper, pepperoni, and mushrooms. Heat through. Com- bine this mixture with the cooked pasta. Pour half of this mixture with the cooked pasta. Pour half the mixture in a 9 x 9 inch baking pan. Layer half of the Mozzarella cheese on top. Pour in rest of the ground beef mixture and top with the remaining cheese. Bake at 350Â° for 20 to 25 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
